item.title: How the Remote Learning Pivot Sparked Innovation in Education
item.description: By Bj√∏rn Erik Pedersen (@bepsays / @bep), Hugo Lead Five years ago today, Steve Francia made his first commit on the Hugo project: “Hugo: A Fast and Flexible Static Site Generator built with love by spf13 in GoLang”. Steve was writing that on a train commute to New York. I’m writing this article running Hugo v0.43-DEV, the preview version of the next Hugo release. The release is scheduled for Monday and adds a powerful assets pipeline, with SCSS/SASS support, assets minification, fingerprinting/subresource integrity, ad-hoc image processing and much more.

item.title: Want to Enter a School Building? Get Scanned First
